metadata.title: CVE-2023-3867 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
[ksmbd: add missing compound request handing in some commands]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3867` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic - 6.2.0-36.37~22.04.1
linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-36.37~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic - 6.2.0-36.37~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic-64k - 6.2.0-36.37~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1015-aws - 6.2.0-1015.15~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-azure - 6.2.0-1016.16~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-azure-fde - 6.2.0-1016.16~22.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1018-gcp - 6.2.0-1018.20~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1016.16~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1016.16~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1019-oem - 6.1.0-1019.19
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1011-nvidia - 6.2.0-1011.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1011-nvidia-64k - 6.2.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1009-starfive - 6.2.0-1009.10~22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
linux-hwe-6.2 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-36.37~22.04.1').
linux-kvm package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
